string.name: RegisterYourself
string.u: Don\'t have an account?Sign Up Now!

resources.string: Enter your email to reset your password:
Q1. Is my personal information shared with anyone?

A1. At Bookify, we respect your need for confidentiality and we will never share personal information with anyone. We do at times run reports to understand general population behaviour and needs, however this is never on a personal level and definitely never uses your name, email address or anything else that uniquely identifies you. Should you still have any concerns about your data, please feel free to contact us directly with your specific question.

A2. The majority of products within our app are available online or at your nearby Book stores. At this stage we are unable to provide you with a list of retailers that sell these products, however this is something that we are working on.
Q2. Where can i buy the products shown within the app?
Q3. How long will it take for the product to be delivered?
A3. The maximum time for the product deliver is 5â€“7 weekdays.However, it also depends wheter you live in urban or rural areas.
Q4. Can i create multiple profiles within the app?

A4. Absolutely, Bookify:The exclusive book hub app is designed with keeping the idea of family in mind. Create a profile by going to Register Account for each member and set their individual preferences or needs.
Q5. Can you tell me where to buy the products?
A5. Unfortunately, we cannot tell you which retailer stocks the selected product at this time, however this is something we are working on. Follow us on social media for regular updates.
